snippet: After criticism from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, the State Board of Regents set aside a proposal to let teachers contest poor assessments by citing difficulties related to the new Common Core standards.
lead_paragraph: After criticism from Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, the State Board of Regents set aside a proposal to let teachers contest poor assessments by citing difficulties related to the new Common Core standards.

headline.main: New York Officials Stall Plans to Tweak Teacher Evaluations
headline.print_headline: New York Officials Stall Plans to Tweak Teacher Evaluations
